ygData.subject: Re: Strange Item...
ygData.msgSnippet: The lizardman fife is a quest item used for a few ogre and troll quests. Any use beyond that I do not know of. Arithon 23 Bard Erollisi Marr ... A ... flute
ygData.messageBody:
The lizardman fife is a quest item used for a few ogre and troll quests.
Any use beyond that I do not know of.
Arithon
23 Bard
Erollisi Marr


>Ok now that is too freaking weird. The same thing happened to me tonite.
A
>higher level druid friend of mine offered me one also. She said she got it
>from Guk, I think that is where she said she got it so don't quote me on
>that. I had to log out and never got a chance to meet up with her. Any
>info on it would be appreciated.
>
>Kurik
>19th Bard
>Veeshan
>
